mapper.select: select u_no, u_nickname, u_password, u_type from users where u_email = #{u_email} and u_password = #{u_password}
select u_no, u_email, u_password, u_nickname, u_gender, u_phone, u_type from users where u_no = #{u_no}
update users set u_no = #{u_no}, u_password = #{u_password}, u_nickname = #{u_nickname}, u_gender = #{u_gender}, u_phone = #{u_phone}, u_type = #{u_type} where u_email = #{u_email}

select u.u_no, s.s_no, s.s_name, r.r_contents, to_char(r_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS r_date, r.star, r.savename from users u, store s, review r where u.u_no = s.u_no and s.u_no = r.u_no and u.u_no = r.u_no and s.s_no = r.s_no order by r_date desc
